trans-unit.source: Provides a data-binding handler for a hyperlink property.
trans-unit.target: 超連結屬性中提供的資料繫結處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HyperLinkDataBindingHandler"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HyperLinkDataBindingHandler"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Resolves design-time data-binding for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 解析指定的控制項的設計階段資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: This method determines whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control are data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>是資料繫結的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to "DataBound".
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>屬性是資料繫結，這個方法會設定 「 資料繫結 」 到屬性的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to a text string so the control will have the appearance of a working hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性是資料繫結，這個方法會設定為字串屬性的值，控制項必須使用超連結外觀。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the document that contains the control.
